modules.description: Provides functions for parsing command-line options and executing HTTP-based tools using a specified HTTP module. Works with command-line arguments, HTTP modules, and configuration profiles. Used to build command-line tools that perform network requests with customizable options like profiles, HTTP backends, and certificate settings.

Provides functions to load and manage SOLID pod profiles, including certificate and key file paths, and cache directory settings. Operates on JSON data structures representing profile configurations. Enables command-line tools to select and apply specific profiles for secure pod interactions.

handles command-line argument parsing and HTTP request execution, integrating with customizable profiles, HTTP backends, and security settings. It defines types for options, profiles, and HTTP modules, offering operations to load configurations, construct requests, and manage responses. Users can create tools that fetch data from URLs, apply certificate validation, or switch between HTTP implementations. Example tasks include downloading resources with specified timeouts or sending authenticated API requests using predefined profiles.
